contextMessage: You are a compiler expert for C++ code optimization. Our goal is to improve the existing code.
onePromptTask: Consider the following input code in C++:
onePromptSteps: Consider the following clang optimization report. Task 1: Prioritize the missed optimization in terms of expected improvement. Task 2: Revise the input code.
compFailPrompt: This code did not compile. Here are the error messages, try again.
testFailPrompt: This version failed the regression tests. Try again.
